Awww well I hope ya can get the whole show posted cuz I missed it!!!!! I was so disappointed when a friend at work told me out of the blue "I saw the best Maury show today" and as soon as she said it beels rang and I said O CRAP was it debbie again? She dont know ya so she wasnt sure but once she started tellin me about it I was pretty sure i'd missed it =( Been workin so much that I forgot completely once I got switched back to dayshift this week I been like a zombie LOL. Yeah I know boohoooo wah wahhh LOL but I really did kick myself for lettin that slip by because I meant to tape it like last time so I could watch ya.
   
  Misty

Debbie
